 18 /**
 19  * Displays the current selection. Use the displaySelection method.
 20  * 
 21  * @param properties A map of fields to set. Refer to the list of non-private fields.  
 22  * @class AbstractSelectionView
 23  */
 24 jQuery.solrjs.AbstractSelectionView = jQuery.solrjs.createClass (null, /** @lends jQuery.solrjs.AbstractSelectionView.prototype */ { 
 25 
 26   /** 
 27    * A unique identifier of this widget.
 28    *
 29    * @field 
 30    * @public
 31    */
 32   id : "", 
 33   
 34   /** 
 35    * A css classname representing the "target div" inside the html page.
 36    * All ui changes will be performed inside this empty div.
 37    * 
 38    * @field 
 39    * @private
 40    */
 41   target : "",
 42 
 43   displaySelection : function(selectedItems) { 
 44     throw "Abstract method displaySelection";    	
 45 	}
 46 	
 47 });
